 loads trend with name 'funcname' from datafile in active rw_mode. If no 'funcname' specified loads the first one.

void surfit::_trend_info (trend *fnc)

trend * surfit::_trend_project (trend *trnd, grid *grd)
 recalculates trnd to new grd using bilinear interpolation algorithm
trend * surfit::_trend_project (trend *trnd, grid *grd, grid_line *fault_line)
 recalculates trnd to new grid "grd" using bilinear interpolation algorithm with taking fault_line into account as faults

void surfit::_set_surfit_trend (trend *fnc)
 sets pointer surfit_trend to fnc
void surfit::_add_surfit_trends (trend *fnc)
 adds function fnc to collection surfit_trends
